feed.title: Electric Jones
feed.subtitle: I thrive on creative collaboration with smart, passionate people solving complex problems using computer science. I also view life like an old school action rpg, and this site is the map I leave for others to join me on my journey.

entry.title: My IBM Qiskit Certification Journey | Part 3

link.title: My IBM Qiskit Certification Journey | Part 3

entry.content:
Math and physics were never my strong suit, but with these resources I got up to speed pretty quickly.

Series Outline

  1. Introduction and Outline
  2. Prologue and Quantum Computing Exploration
  3. Foundations (Theory, Math, and Computer Science) <– You are here
  4. Qiskit Part A: Qbits, Gates, and Circuits
  5. Qiskit Part B: Algorithms and All the Rest
  6. The Missing Pieces
  7. Perparing for the Exam
  8. My Exam Experience and Conclusion
entry.summary: Math and physics were never my strong suit, but with these resources I got up to speed pretty quickly.

entry.title: My IBM Qiskit Certification Journey | Part 2

link.title: My IBM Qiskit Certification Journey | Part 2

entry.content:
I had been fascinates by Quantum Computing for a number of years, but when I decided to really take the plunge, I had some catching up to do.

This post is a smattering of the videos, lectures, and articles I perused to understand the power and process of Quantum Computing.

Series Outline

  1. Introduction and Outline
  2. Prologue and Quantum Computing Exploration <– You are here
  3. Foundations (Theory, Math, and Computer Science)
  4. Qiskit Part A: Qbits, Gates, and Circuits
  5. Qiskit Part B: Algorithms and All the Rest
  6. The Missing Pieces
  7. Perparing for the Exam
  8. My Exam Experience and Conclusion
entry.summary: I had been fascinates by Quantum Computing for a number of years, but when I decided to really take the plunge, I had some catching up to do.

entry.title: My IBM Qiskit Certification Journey | Part 1

link.title: My IBM Qiskit Certification Journey | Part 1

entry.content:
The IBM Qiskit Certification is the first widely-available certification for Quantum Computing. This series is my journey to studying and preparing for the certification.

Series Outline

  1. Introduction and Outline <– You are here
  2. Prologue and Quantum Computing Exploration
  3. Foundations (Theory, Math, and Computer Science)
  4. Qiskit Part A: Qbits, Gates, and Circuits
  5. Qiskit Part B: Algorithms and All the Rest
  6. The Missing Pieces
  7. Perparing for the Exam
  8. My Exam Experience and Conclusion
entry.summary: The IBM Qiskit Certification is the first widely-available certification for Quantum Computing. This series is my journey to studying and preparing for the certification.
